title: Is a guitar an example of technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: I guess it depends on your definition of technology. Some models of guitars are made almost exactly the same way they were over 100 years ago- not much of an advance In technology. While there have been some amazing advancements in both electric and acoustic guitars, realize that the most popular model electric guitars sold in 2020 were first made over 70 years ago. Again, not much of an advance in technology. Perhaps the way the guitar is made and the materials being used have technologically advanced, popular models and designs have not.

Technology is defined as “the application of scientific knowledge for practical purposes, especially in industry.” -copy pasted from google So, by definition yes. Basically anything innovative in this world. Something as simple as an inclined plane (simple machine) is an example of technology.
